title: A vindication of the armie, from some calumnious quæres being not so much a particular answer to those nine severall quæres, as to the scope of the author in them. By Jo: Harr: Esq.
author: Harr, Jo.
notes: Wing H803C reports title as: "A vindication of the armie, from sole ...".
Identified as Wing V498A, reel 2375, and Wing H803C, reel 2403 of the UMI microfilm set "Early English books 1641-1700".
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
